response.original_title: This Sacred Place: The Story of Old Lynn Concerts
response.overview: A small rural church sits at a crossroads in Lynn, Pennsylvania. Home to music since it was built in 1883, the church was transformed into a concert venue nineteen years ago, bringing in renowned singer-songwriters from all over the world.  This Sacred Place: The Story of Old Lynn Concerts tells the unlikely story of how this sacred place became a respected music venue. The history of Old Lynn is presented along with footage from the last show of the series, featuring performances from Lorne Clarke, Tom Flannery, and Bret Alexander.
response.tagline: Nineteen years of music. One final show.
response.title: This Sacred Place: The Story of Old Lynn Concerts
